name: Sprog (Deeplication)
description:
Sprog is hard 2D Game. The Movement is fast and skill based. You can only move left and right with Pyhsics.

How to Play:

  1. Use A and D to Rotate.
  2. Use W or S to move up or down.
  3. Space to Pause.
  4. Dont touch any red Objects.
  5. Always save in the Pause Menu.
  6. You can only save when no red Objects are near you.

Help:

  1.  Save before your death.
  2.  Save before you press Quit in the Pause Menu.
  3.  Use the Circles to Move. 

Try Finding own solutions for all situations.
